reviews.review:
Forget the formula this stands apart.  Very different flavour keeps the MCU fresh.  As the filmmakers kept telling us this is the culmination of all that has gone before so must be invested in previous films.  

Worth watching all of the previous MIC films to fully appreciate but watching Age of Ultron, Guardians of the Galaxy, Civil War and Ragnarock would just about get you there.
We have got what we wanted. But not in a good way...

NO SPOILERS, All I will say is that this the culmination of 10 years of world building, something that Marvel Studios should be very proud of.

If you have not seen any or a small amount of the marvel movies, don't make this your starting off point.

Must watch films prior to seeing this: Avengers 1 & 2, All 3 capt. Americas, Thor 1 and 3, All three Iron Man films, Dr. Strange and both guardians films... maybe Spiderman Homecoming as well.

Enjoy!

Infinity War has the almost impossible task of fully realizing every character it has thus far introduced, whilst still making for a thrilling, fan satisfying, emotionally pleasing, blockbuster. And boy does it deliver. To say everything was absolutely perfect, would be to lie - but this film gets 99.95% of it right. I was all in from the get-go. The best Marvel film to date. Without a doubt.

Avengers Infinity War blew away all expectations! This is a movie 10 years in the making and it was definitely worth the wait. Dare to say that it is the best Marvel movie of all time. Thanos was so much more than an ordinary villain his motives are clear and he really believes that what he's doing is for the best. The action was also very intense, especially in the Wakanda battle. If you're a big Marvel fan, this movie is definitely for you!

Best movie from marvel yet! 

Just a shame they didn't focus equal time on all of the hero's

This is Thanos' story. They have addressed the concerns about previous Marvel movies by making Thanos shine as the stand out performing with his back story, development, and motive. Fitting such an ensemble of heroes into one movie was a gargantuan task but the Russos pulled it off. The tone was great, and the interactions between characters was fantastic and the heart beat of the good guy story.
Amazing Movie , So intense, Great Comedy, Unpredictable and Certainly Shocking ! 10/10
Bloated, uneven, messy, long, and completely devoid of character. Grade: D-

Marvel's Avengers: Infinity War is the best Marvel movie ever made. Thanos is simply the best villain of all in Marvel Cinematic Universe. He's not only the evilest, but he's the smartest villain due to his political belief and quick wit. There were several comedic scenes that made me laugh my ass off, so I appreciate Marvel's idea with constant comedic in their movies. I also almost cried at the ending, so the ending was pretty emotional for all of Marvel fans. I would give the movie a rating of 6/5 if I could, so it was worth my money. Go and watch it, you won't regret it.
